Headline: #53A South Pulaski Temporary Northbound Reroute near Pulaski/70th
ShortDescription: Northbound #53A buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, 71st, Kedzie, Marquette, and Pulaski, due to an accident near Pulaski/70th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #53A South Pulaski  buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, 71st, Kedzie, Marquette, and Pulaski, due to an accident near Pulaski/70th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
